item.description:
Come and enjoy a 2 hour workshop on finding a story from your life experience with coaching and pointers on performance. Storytelling is a whole performance art unto itself.

In this workshop you will begin to learn how storytelling differs from theater, stand up and twisting balloon animals and how to mine your life experience to craft a story. Followed by an open mic opportunity to tell your story to an audience.

 

Limited to 16 and minimum of 6 to run. Please arrive by 6:15 to sign in workshop begins at 6:30 pm. $35.00

participants must pre register by sending an e-mail to  andrea@massmouth.com

tickets available online at www.massmouth.eventbrite.com

Taught by professional massmouth tellers.

 

Andrea Lovett professsional performance coach, educator and story lover.

http://www.andrealovett.blogspot.com 

Nov. 28th, 2011

Andrea Lovett
at massmouth,Inc. offices
42 Seaverns Ave
Boston (Jamaica Plain), MA
item.how_to_find_us: 5 minute walk from Green Street stop /Orange Line or #39 Bus to Centre Street. Buzz #3 and you'll be able to enter the building.

group.name: CLOSING DOWN THIS MEETUP GROUP: massmouth storytellers

item.name: How to Tell a Kickbutt 5 minute Story Workshop
